content: free crochet pattern tiny spider to crochet this tiny spider you will need black bobbin thread crochet hook 0 4 mm \ japanese size 24 no us equivalent\ or 0 5 mm \ us steel crochet hook size 18\ i used a 0 4 mm hook thin black wire diameter 0 3 mm \ 0 01 in\ stuffing polyester fiberfil glue gel moment brand super glue thin sturdy needle for sewing parts together sharp nail scissors round-nose pliers stuffing aide toothpick etc wire cutters remnant of colorful yarn about 15 cm \ 5 9 in\ for embroidering the body pattern © 2021 anastasia kirsanova / nansyoops english translation © 2021 katharina sokiran all rights reserved this pattern is the intellectual property of anastasia kirs copying and extracting text and materials from this pattern is not allowed including but not limited to the use for training purposes of any kind please note that this pattern may not be used for training artificial intelligence systems
